Name: The Orc Invasion
About the game: You are Gabu, the sole survivor orc from the ruthless invasion of human empire. Before you stands an invaded and pillaged orc lands desperate for a saviour. Gabu's initial motive is to liberate his captured towns and then investigate the reasons behind disregarding the hundred years of peace between races. Game is a narrative driven 2,5D platformer shooter. It's based on collecting gold and raw resources from battlefield, learning new recipes, crafting tools, furnatures, alloys, components and battle armaments which are necessary to upgrade yourself, your army and your mobile castle from basic to advanced. Rescuing your commarades from towns to enhance your crafting system and let them craft basic mastered items for you. Moral decisions will alter behaviour of other nations and even your own faithfull folk goblins towards you. This will also shape what kind of soldiers you can send into battlefield in later stages of the game. Game features 9 different goblin soldier class, over 100 recipes and over 125 items ready to be discovered.
